#BlackMagicCraft #Episode100

EPISODE 100! I decided to get myself some flowers üíÄüåπüíÄüåπüíÄüåπ

This episode I build the awesome Corpse Flower monster from Mordenkainen's Tome of Foes!

David Lane was the guy who made the first one I saw in the TCG group: https://twitter.com/Tyrennii/status/1003563505654493191

STATIC GRASS TUFT REVIEW: http://bit.ly/StaticGrassReview
